mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fpComment(fp_seq, fpc_id, fpc_code, fpc_content, fpc_date, fpc_login) VALUES(#{fp_seq}, #{fpc_id}, #{fpc_code}, #{fpc_content}, #{fpc_date}, #{fpc_login})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM fpComment WHERE fp_seq = #{fp_seq} AND fpc_seq = #{fpc_seq}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM fpComment LEFT JOIN users ON fpComment.fpc_id = users.us_id WHERE fp_seq = #{fp_seq} ORDER BY fpc_seq DESC
